*Trailer, mobile classroom_
request for proposal (RFP)
Mobile Laboratory

This document outlines a request for proposal (RFP) issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Defence Research and Development Canada – Valcartier for the acquisition and delivery of a mobile laboratory installed on a truck. The laboratory will be used to support research and development activities at Defence Research and Development Canada – Valcartier.
